Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.rest

Class TextTransformerClass

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.transformer.rest.TextTransformerClass
public class TextTransformerClass extends Object
A class representing a text transformer with various options.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextTransformerClass

      public TextTransformerClass(@NotNull @NotNull String transform, boolean numbers, boolean inverse, @NotNull @NotNull String shortcuts, boolean latex, boolean neighbors)
      Constructs a TextTransformerClass with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      transform - the basic transformation string
      numbers - indicates whether to transform numbers
      inverse - indicates whether to apply the transformation inversely
      shortcuts - a string containing shortcuts for the transformation
      latex - indicates whether to use LaTeX formatting
      neighbors - indicates whether to consider neighboring elements

      Checks if the transformation is applied inversely.
      Returns:
      true if the transformation is applied inversely, false otherwise
